import React from 'react'; import '../styles/PersonCard.css'; const PersonCard = ({ person }) => { return (
{person.photo ? ( ) : (
{person.prenom?.charAt(0) || ''}{person.nom?.charAt(0) || ''}
)}

{person.prenom} {person.nom}

üìû {person.telephone}

üìç {person.quartier}, {person.region}

üè¥ Pays: {person.pays}
{person.travail ? ( <>
üíº Profession: {person.profession}
üè¢ Entreprise: {person.entreprise}
) : (
üéì Formation: {person.formation}
)}
üìö Daara: {person.daara}
); }; export default PersonCard;
